verses.roman:
vāmya-svabhāve māna uṭhe nirantara
tāra madhye uṭhe kṛṣṇera ānanda-sāgara

synonyms: vāmya-svabhāve—because of left-wing character; māna—womanly anger; uṭhe—awakens; nirantara—always; tāra madhye—in that dealing; uṭhe—is awakening; kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; ānanda-sāgara—an ocean of transcendental bliss.
translation: "Because She is a left-wing gopī, Her womanly anger is always awakening, but Kṛṣṇa derives transcendental bliss from Her activities.
